name: The Exploratorium
description: The Exploratorium is a public learning laboratory exploring the world through science, art and human perception. Our mission is to create inquiry-based experiences that transform learning worldwide. Our vision is a world where people think for themselves and can confidently ask questions, question answers, and understand the world around them.
fullDescription: The Exploratorium is a public learning laboratory exploring the world through science, art and human perception. Our mission is to create inquiry-based experiences that transform learning worldwide. Our vision is a world where people think for themselves and can confidently ask questions, question answers, and understand the world around them.
whatTheyOffer: The Exploratorium is a public learning laboratory exploring the world through science, art and human perception. Their vision is for a world in which people can confidently ask questions and learn to understand the world.
